授業目的: The purpose of this course is to provide students with an understanding of the principles of marketing and a range of the 21st century’s issues that influence marketing management and planning decisions.
到達目標:
1. Students will acquire a basic understanding of marketing and recognize its role as the significant link between companies and customers.
2. Students will acquire a practical understanding of marketing tools in creating, communicating, and delivering values to customers.
3. Students will develop the ability to apply a practical understanding of marketing principles and tools to a marketing plan project.
授業方法: Online Format. Lecture, discussion, group-work and class presentation.

トピック.授業外学習2: For the first class of Marketing Management, please prepare a one-page essay of your impression of what marketing means to you. This essay should base on your personal experience as a consumer or work-related experience. There is no right or wrong answer for this essay, so please feel free to write about your honest opinion and experience.
